data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Tales of the Far East
data.detailed_description:
Feel yourself get carried away to the exotic locations of the Far East.

Tales of the Far East is filled with themes that are both inspiring and useful. From the busy markets in the heart of the desert to the quiet solitude of beautiful bamboo groves, each song is a melodious journey that invokes emotion. The use of traditional instruments brings an air of authenticity to each piece, while keeping it current and ready for use in your projects.

Music preview on Soundcloud

This pack contains:
  • 15 music themes
  • Authentic traditional instruments and melodies
  • Quality compositions, using a variety of instruments and sounds
  • BONUS: .mp3 and .flac formats for easy listening while you work or relax
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
